import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.optim import AdamW
from torch.utils.data import DataLoader
from tqdm import tqdm
import logging

# Configure logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s', filename='training.log')

class Trainer:
    def __init__(self, model, train_dataset, val_dataset, batch_size, learning_rate, weight_decay, epochs, device):
        self.model = model.to(device)
        self.train_loader = DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=True)
        self.val_loader = DataLoader(val_dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)
        self.optimizer = AdamW(model.parameters(), lr=learning_rate, weight_decay=weight_decay)
        self.epochs = epochs
        self.device = device

    def train(self):
        for epoch in range(self.epochs):
            self.model.train()
            train_loss = 0.0
            for batch in tqdm(self.train_loader, desc=f"Epoch {epoch+1}/{self.epochs} [Train]"):
                inputs = batch['input_ids'].to(self.device)
                attention_mask = batch['attention_mask'].to(self.device)
                labels = batch['labels'].to(self.device)
                self.optimizer.zero_grad()
                outputs = self.model(inputs, attention_mask=attention_mask, labels=labels)
                loss = outputs.loss
                loss.backward()
                self.optimizer.step()
                train_loss += loss.item()
            train_loss /= len(self.train_loader)

            val_loss = self.validate()
            logging.info(f'Epoch {epoch+1}, Train Loss: {train_loss:.4f}, Val Loss: {val_loss:.4f}, Learning Rate: {self.optimizer.param_groups[0]["lr"]}')


    def validate(self):
        self.model.eval()
        val_loss = 0.0
        with torch.no_grad():
            for batch in tqdm(self.val_loader, desc="[Validation]"):
                inputs = batch['input_ids'].to(self.device)
                attention_mask = batch['attention_mask'].to(self.device)
                labels = batch['labels'].to(self.device)
                outputs = self.model(inputs, attention_mask=attention_mask, labels=labels)
                loss = outputs.loss
                val_loss += loss.item()
        val_loss /= len(self.val_loader)
        return val_loss"
